articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Letter to Participants in Meeting of Primary Organization Cadres of Youth League
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Letter to Participants in Meeting of Primary Organization Cadres of Youth League
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un sent letter "Let Youth Become Vanguard Fighters Intensely Loyal to the Songun Revolutionary Cause of the Party" to the participants in the 4th meeting of primary organization cadres of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League on September 18, Juche 103 (2014).
					 In the letter Kim Jong Un said that President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il loved the youth most and devoted great wisdom and energy to the work with the youth all their lives.
					
					 The President began his revolutionary activities in his early years by going among young people and rallying them around fighting ranks as comrades sharing life and death, he said, and went on:
					
					 The President set forth the unique idea of attaching importance to the youth, successfully embodied it and brought up them as powerful vanguard ranks for the revolution and dependable reserve of the party. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il, carrying forward the President's idea of attaching importance to the youth, handed to the youth the torch of the revolution and made sure that the youth league shined with the august name of the President.
					
					 He also provided energetic leadership so that the youth creditably discharged their mission and duties before the times and the revolution.
					
					 Kim Jong Un recalled in the letter that youth have covered a glorious path, glorifying the annals of the revolution with heroic feats and proud victories under the wise guidance and warm loving care of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. He went on:
					
					 The youth who represented the first generation of the Korean revolution achieved the historical cause of Korea's liberation by making long journeys for bloody battles against the Japanese imperialists, holding Kim Il Sung in high esteem as the sun of the nation, and set a shining example in safeguarding the leader at the cost of their lives.
					
					 The young people fought heroically in the Fatherland Liberation War, shouting "Long Live General Kim Il Sung!", thus bringing July 27, the day of victory. In the postwar period of socialist construction, too, they performed world-startling feats in difficult and labor-consuming fields, taking the lead in upholding the intentions of the party and the leader, and thus fully demonstrated the heroic stamina of Chollima Korea.
					
					 During the unprecedentedly grim period of the Arduous March, the forced march, they set their hearts ablaze with their fixed will to share destiny with Kim Jong Il to the end, strikingly demonstrating the invincible might of Songun Korea in defending socialism and in confrontation with the U.S.
					
					 Kim Jong Un stressed that the tradition of devotedly defending the leader, the tradition of heroic struggle that was created and has been successfully carried forward in the annals of the revolution, is precious revolutionary wealth and an eternal banner of victory which our youth should carry forward generation after generation.
					
					 He added that the present era is the era of dynamic struggles, a new era of the Juche revolution, as an all-out charge is being made to achieve the final victory of the revolution under the uplifted banner of the great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism under the leadership of the party.
					
					 He called on the youth to creditably perform their role as the young vanguard of the party by devoting their energies, wisdom and enthusiasm to the on-going historical advance.
					
					 He stressed that "Let Youth Become Vanguard Fighters Intensely Loyal to the Songun Revolutionary Cause of the Party!" is a militant slogan to be held up by the Korean youth.
					
					 He continued: 
					
					 Young people should remain true to the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea and become a fortress and shield devotedly safeguarding the party.
					
					 They should become vanguard fighters implementing the party's ideology and defending the party's policies and become a death-defying corps in defending the socialist motherland.
					
					 They should establish the traits of always prizing arms and attaching importance to military affairs and resolutely foil the imperialists' ideological and cultural poisoning.
					
					 They should become vanguard fighters and shock-brigade members in building a thriving socialist nation and pace-setters in pushing back the frontiers of the latest science and technology and take the lead in ushering in the heyday of a highly civilized socialist nation.
					
					 Kim Jong Un clarified the position and role the primary organizations of the youth league have in making sure that the young people successfully perform their honorable mission as the young vanguard of the party in the new era.
					
					 He expressed his conviction that all young people would fully display the heroic stamina as the young vanguard in the historical advance for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Songun under the leadership of the party.

articles.title: Meeting of Primary Organization Cadres of Youth League Held
articles.content:
Meeting of Primary Organization Cadres of Youth League Held
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- The 4th meeting of primary organization cadres of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League was held here on Thursday and Friday.
					 The meeting marked an important occasion in enhancing the militancy of the primary organizations of the youth league as required by the important historical period when the revolutionary cause of Juche is being accomplished and thus strengthening the youth leaguer into the young vanguard organization of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Choe Ryong Hae, exemplary officials of primary organizations of the youth league and its officials in Pyongyang and local areas and officials concerned.
					
					 The letter sent by supreme leader Kim Jong Un "Let Youth Become Vanguard Fighters Intensely Loyal to the Songun Revolutionary Cause of the Party" to the participants in the 4th meeting of primary organization cadres of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League was conveyed by Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, at the meeting.
					
					  Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the C.C., the youth league, made a report at the meeting.
					
					  The reporter said:
					
					  President Kim Il Sung set it as an important task of the youth movement to bring up young people as steadfast and able socialist builders ideologically as required by the developing revolution and led the primary organizations of the youth league to creditably carry out their missions and duties.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il who ushered in a heyday in the Juche-oriented youth movement developed the youth league into the one of the President and the reliable young vanguard ranks of the party.
					
					  The Juche-oriented youth movement is being successfully carried forward and developed thanks to Kim Jong Un and greeting the new heyday of its development.
					
					 The reporter referred to the fact that in the past period, the primary organizations of the youth league have worked hard to firmly prepare its members into the vanguard fighters devotedly defending the leader and powerfully encourage them in the grand advance for building a thriving nation.
					
					 He said that the primary organizations of the youth league should prepare all young people into genuine Kimilsungists-Kimjongilists remaining unfailingly loyal to Kim Jong Un and make sure that they give fullest play to the stamina of the young vanguard in the era of Songun in the sacred struggle to win the final victory.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meeting.
					
					  Han In Chol, chairman of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the youth league, extended greatest glory and warmest thanks to Kim Jong Un for providing the meeting to be recorded as a shining chapter in the history of the Juche-based youth movement, sending a letter and clearly indicating the way to be followed by the Korean youth movement.
					
					 Kim Jin Ok, chairwoman of the primary organization of the Pyongyang Orphanage, and Jang Mi Hyang, chairwoman of the primary organization of the Songdowon International Children's Camp, expressed their will to make song "We Are the Happiest in the World" resound forth across the country for all ages, true to the noble intention of Kim Jong Un who is beautifully bringing up the future of the country, embracing all children of the country.
					
					 Kim Ok Hyang, chairwoman of the primary organization of the General Weaving Shop of the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill said that youth league members overfulfilled the plan for national economy every year by fully displaying the spirit of collectivism. 
					
					 Song Chol Jun, chairman of the primary committee of the youth league of the Migok Cooperative Farm of Sariwon City, expressed his will to arouse the youth work-team members to the struggle to implement the behests of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and remain loyal to the  Workers' Party of Korea with rice.
					
					 Speakers said that the officials of the youth league should deeply realize the great expectation of the party and the importance of the work of the youth league, decisively enhance the militant function and role of the primary organizations and make the youth league the young vanguard organization, upholding the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Un with loyalty.

articles.title: Mongolian President Meets WPK Delegation
articles.content:
Mongolian President Meets WPK Delegation
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Mongolian President Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Kang Sok Ju, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, which paid a courtesy call on him at the state building on September 18.
					 The president said that steadfast is the stand of the Mongolian government and people to develop the relations with the DPRK and in order to boost the bilateral relations it is necessary to continue carrying forward the traditional friendly relations provided by the preceding leaders. 
					
					 "Sanctions" against the DPRK to isolate and stifle it persist but Mongolia calls for settling all problems through dialogue and negotiations, he noted.
					
					 Present there were the advisor for National Security and Foreign Policy of the President, a vice-minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade, the Mongolian ambassador to the DPRK and the DPRK ambassador to Mongolia.

articles.title: Mongolian PM Meets WPK Delegation
articles.content:
Mongolian PM Meets WPK Delegation
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Noroviin Altankhuyag, prime minister of Mongolia who is chairman of the Mongolian Democratic Party, met and had a talk with the delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Kang Sok Ju, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, on a visit to Mongolia at the state building on Sept. 18.
					 Present there were the minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade of Mongolia, the general secretary of the Mongolian Democratic Party, the Mongolian ambassador to the DPRK and the DPRK ambassador to Mongolia.
					
					 The prime minister said that the relations between the two countries are the long-standing traditional and friendly relations, adding the Mongolian Democratic Party is attaching importance to the relations with the DPRK.
					
					 Referring to the fact that the Mongolian president visited the DPRK the significant year marking the 25th anniversary of the visit of President Kim Il Sung to Mongolia, he said that the visit of the WPK delegation will mark an important occasion in developing the relations between the two parties and two countries.
					
					 He expressed the will to work hard to expand and develop the friendly and cooperative relations with the DPRK in the political, economic and other various fields.

articles.title: Talks Held between Delegations of WPK and MDP
articles.content:
Talks Held between Delegations of WPK and MDP 
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Talks between the delegations of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the Mongolian Democratic Party (MDP) took place at the state building on Thursday. 
					 Present at the talks from the DPRK side were members of the delegation of the WPK led by Kang Sok Ju, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, and the DPRK ambassador to Mongolia, and from the Mongolian side were members of the MDP delegation led by the general secretary and the Mongolian ambassador to the DPRK. 
					
					 At the talks both sides informed each other of activities of their parties and exchanged views on the issue of boosting the friendly relations between the two parties and issues of mutual concern. 
					
					 Meanwhile, that day the WPK delegation respectively met and had talks with the advisor for National Security and Foreign Policy of the President, the minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade, the mayor of Ulan Bator and members of the leadership of the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party.

articles.title: Egyptian President Wishes Korean People Successes
articles.content:
Egyptian President Wishes Korean People Successes
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Abdel Fattah al-Sisi, president of the Arab Republic of Egypt, received credentials from Pak Chun Il, DPRK ambassador to Egypt, on Sep. 14.
					 The president wished the Korean people successes in their efforts for social well-being and prosperity.

articles.title: Niger President Hopes for Korea's Peaceful Reunification
articles.content:
Niger President Hopes for Korea's Peaceful Reunification 
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Mahamadou Issoufou, president of the Republic of Niger, received credentials from Jong Yong Chol, DPRK ambassador to Niger, on Sept. 12.
					 The president said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il positively supported the African countries including Niger in their struggle for achieving national independence and building a new society in their lifetimes.
					
					 The people of the African countries remember this and bear it deep in mind.
					
					 I admire Marshal Kim Jong Un who is turning the DPRK into a powerful country, true to the cause of the preceding leaders.
					
					 I hope that everything will go well in the DPRK and Korea's reunification be achieved peacefully as soon as possible.

articles.title: President of Council of State of Cuba Sends Floral Basket to DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
President of Council of State of Cuba Sends Floral Basket to DPRK Embassy
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Raul Castro Ruz, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, sent a floral basket to the DPRK embassy in Havana on Sept. 9, the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK.

articles.title: National Presentation of Scientific and Technological Achievements of Chemical Industry
articles.content:
National Presentation of Scientific and Technological Achievements of Chemical Industry 
 Anju, September 19 (KCNA) -- A national presentation of scientific and technological achievements gained in the field of chemical industry was held at the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex on Thursday and Friday under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 Present there were scientists, technicians, teachers, researchers, postgraduates and officials of science and education institutions and the field of chemical industry, including the State Academy of Sciences, Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Kim Hyong Jik University of Education, Pyongyang Han Tok Su University of Light Industry and the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex.
					
					 The participants heard at least 60 valuable papers prepared by various units.
					
					 Speakers introduced successes and experience gained in solving the scientific and technological issues arising in increasing the proportion of locally available raw and other materials needed for producing varieties of fertilizers and chemical products by further developing the nation's chemical industry.

articles.title: FIFA Goal Keeper Coaching Course Given in DPRK
articles.content:
FIFA Goal Keeper Coaching Course Given in DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- A FIFA goal keeper coaching course took place here from September 15 to 19.
					 It drew coaches from local sports teams and teachers of juvenile sports schools.
					
					 The course, divided into theoretical and practical sections, dealt with selection of goal keepers, physical fitness, goalkeeper's role, warming up, training method, etc.
					
					 It was officiated by Stephan Stooss, a Swiss lecturer of FIFA.
					
					 He highly appreciated the professional level of coaches and teachers and their will to learn, saying that the course was successfully held thanks to the sincere cooperation of the DPRK Football Association.
					
					 He hoped that other projects favorable for the development of football in the DPRK would continue in cooperation with FIFA.

articles.title: 2014 Provincial Mass Sports Contest to Be Held
articles.content:
2014 Provincial Mass Sports Contest to Be Held
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- The 2014 provincial mass sports contest will take place in Pyongyang from Oct. 1 to 10.
					 Its participants will compete in women's football, men's volleyball, women's basketball, roller skating, shooting and other mass sports and amusement events at Kim Il Sung Stadium, the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium, the Meari Shooting Gallery and other stadiums and gymnasiums here.
					
					 It will bring together people from all walks of life including workers, farmers, office workers, school youth and children, kindergarteners, housewives and sportspersons selected from Pyongyang, and each province (municipality).

articles.title: Steady Efforts Paid to Putting Education on IT Basis in DPRK Universities
articles.content:
Steady Efforts Paid to Putting Education on IT Basis in DPRK Universities
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Universities in Pyongyang City have made every possible effort to put education on an IT basis.
					 Kim Il Sung University has steadily updated the content and method of education and improved the condition and environment for education as required by the era of knowledge-based economy.
					
					 All its lecture rooms have been equipped with up-to-date facilities and praiseworthy successes achieved in introducing latest method of education.
					
					 Kim Chaek University of Technology has paid big efforts to putting practical education on an IT basis, giving priority to modernizing experimental setups.
					
					 Pyongyang University of Architecture has made signal successes in combining theory with practice, education with productive labor. It has also upgraded the content of education in keeping with the trend of architectural development.
					
					 Such achievements have been made in other universities and colleges throughout the country.

articles.title: DPRK's Young People Making Contributions to Developing Science
articles.content:
DPRK's Young People Making Contributions to Developing Science
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Young scientists and technicians of the DPRK have made latest scientific achievements conducive to developing the nation's economy, in hearty response to the Workers' Party of Korea's line of glorifying this year with scientific and technical successes.
					 Those in the Electricity Institute under the State Academy of Sciences have succeeded in putting curved-type continuous ingoting process of the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex on a CNC basis to boost steel output.
					
					 Those in the Geology Institute under the academy invented advanced method for prospecting the coal deposits in a short span of time.
					
					 Those in the Electronic Institute under the academy made mid-frequency induction heater. And young technicians in the Pyongyang Essential Foodstuff Factory set up a new ferment liquefaction process to increase the quality of monosodium glutamate.
					
					 New scientific achievements have been also made in the Pyongyang Rubber Factory, Mangyongdae Chicken Farm, Medical Instrument Factory, Pothonggang Foodstuff Factory, Pyongyang School Things Factory.

articles.title: Report on Visit of WPK's Delegation to Germany, Belgium, Switzerland, Italy
articles.content:
Report on Visit of WPK's Delegation to Germany, Belgium, Switzerland, Italy
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Kang Sok Ju, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, visited Germany, Belgium, Switzerland and Italy from September 7 to 16.
					 During its visit the delegation met with high-ranking officials of political parties, governments and economic circles including politicians from various political parties of Europe and discussed the issue of developing relations between the DPRK and the EU and various countries of Europe. They included Niels Annen, member of the Political Bureau of the Social-Democratic Party of Germany and chairman of its International Committee, a high-ranking representative of the German Foreign Ministry, Yonnec Polet, assistant general secretary for External Relations of the Party of European Socialists, Victor Bostinaru, vice-president for External Relations of the Group of Social Parties of the European Parliament, Elmar Brok, chairman of the Committee on Foreign Affairs of the European Parliament, Stavros Lambrinidis, special representative for human rights of the European External Action Service, Beatrice Wertli Meierhans, general secretary of the Christian Democratic People's Party
					
					  of Switzerland, Pascal Couchepin, former president of the Swiss Confederation, Yves Rossier, secretary of State of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Switzerland, Yohannes Matyassy, deputy secretary of State and director for Asia-Pacific of the Ministry, Maurizio Gasparri, vice-president of the Senate of Italy, Paolo Romani, chairman of the Forza Italia Group of the Senate, Massimiliano Fedrica, chairman of the Northern League Group of the Chamber of Deputies, Gian Marco Centianio, chairman of the Northern League Group of the Senate, Antonio Razzi, secretary general of the Commission for Foreign Affairs of the Senate, and Jonathan Powell,  chief executive officer of the Inter Mediate who is former chief of Staff of Downing Street.
					
					 At the talks and conversations they informed each other of the political and economic situation of the DPRK and Europe, made deep and candid exchange of views on the issues of mutual concern, expressed mutual understanding of many issues and agreed to work hard to develop bilateral relations in the future.
					
					 The chairman of the International Committee of the Social-Democratic Party of Germany, the secretary of State of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Switzerland and not a few officials expressed their willingness to visit Pyongyang in the future to discuss more deeply the issue of developing bilateral relations.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Assails U.S. Strategy to Contain Other Big Powers
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Assails U.S. Strategy to Contain Other Big Powers
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and south Korea at a recent meeting in Washington discussed the issue of extending the transfer of the right to control wartime operations to south Korea well beyond 2020.
					 Explaining the reason for this extension, they claimed that the period beyond 2020 is the time meeting the conditions for the transfer as by that time the south Korean army will be capable of coping with the threat from north Korea.
					
					 What the U.S. seeks under the pretext of the non-existent "threat from north Korea" is a product of the U.S. strategy to contain China and Russia. Therefore, it comes under fire by the international community.
					
					 It was quite natural that U.S. experts on foreign policy, security and military affairs during the meeting censured the unreasonable extension of the transfer and became vocal facilitating the process for the withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea.
					
					 As well known to everybody, in July 1950, the U.S. deprived south Korea of prerogative of command over the operations of the three services of the south Korean puppet army through the letter of Syngman Rhee on transferring the right to the U.S. forces.
					
					 In August 1953, the U.S forced the south Korean regime to conclude the U.S.-south Korea "mutual defense treaty", which stipulates that U.S. forces' presence in south Korea is not a duty but a right and all parts of south Korea can be used as U.S. military bases. 
					
					 In November 1954, it was stipulated in the "agreement minutes", the follow-up agreement of the "mutual defense treaty", that the south Korean army is under the operational control of "UN Command" while it is responsible for defending south Korea, and thus the U.S. provided a legal foundation for maintaining the prerogative of command over the south Korean army for an indefinite period.
					
					 In the 2000s the above-said issue was brought into bolder relief and there was increasing likelihood of sparking off an anti-U.S. struggle. Consequently, the U.S. was compelled to agree on the matter of transferring the control to south Korea in April 2012.
					
					 Later the U.S. instigated the south Korean puppet regime to extend the transfer of the control by 2015. It has desperately worked to re-extend the transfer of the control by pushing the situation to the brink of a war and creating "security uneasiness" through various war drills targeted against the north. 
					
					 The issue of extending the transfer of the control is not coordinated in a specific manner now that the timetable for the transfer has not been finally confirmed.
					
					 This clearly reveals the invariable sinister scenario of the U.S. to put under its control the DPRK and its neighboring big powers and Northeast Asia and the rest of the world in the end by persistently taking control over the south Korean puppet army.
					
					 The U.S. forces' presence in south Korea is very harmful now that the Cold War was over and the relations among countries in Northeast Asia dramatically changed.
					
					 The U.S. forces present in south Korea are the root cause of creating constant instability of the situation not only on the Korean peninsula but in the rest of Northeast Asia.
					
					 It is a wise attitude of the U.S. policy makers to make a bold decision to withdraw its forces from south Korea as early as possible.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Learning from Creative Spirit and Fighting Trait of KPA
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Learning from Creative Spirit and Fighting Trait of KPA
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- The Korean People's Army is the only army in the world which is steering the whole society with strong spirit and noble trait, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an editorial.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The KPA is the best in upholding the party and the leader, hardest in working for the country and its people and most admirable in creating spirit and fighting trait.
					
					 The KPA is possessed of the same creative spirit and fighting trait as those of their leader and supreme commander. This is the warmest and genuine spirit of loyalty and the trait of devotedly carrying out any task.
					
					 The KPA's creative spirit and fighting trait represent the present era and a militant banner encouraging service personnel and people.
					
					 The editorial stresses the need to fully embody the KPA's creative spirit and fighting trait in order to uphold the party's idea and intention with loyalty and glorify the new century of Juche with leap forward and innovations.
					
					 It is necessary to learn from the KPA's spirit of implementing the decisions and instructions of the party unconditionally and under any circumstance.
					
					 Everybody should fully display the spirit of self-reliance like the service personnel who explore reserves positively with initiative and make a breakthrough by virtue of science and technology, not waiting  until conditions are provided.
					
					 It is necessary to learn from the total dedication of the service personnel to the country and the generations to come.
					
					 We should set our hearts ablaze with the enthusiasm to work for the future of the country and the happiness of the younger generation like the service personnel.
					
					 An economic power is sure to emerge and the final victory is sure to come if all people learn from the KPA's creative spirit and fighting trait.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Moves for Forming U.S.- S. Korea Combined Division
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Moves for Forming U.S.- S. Korea Combined Division 
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the U.S. was closeted with the south Korean puppet forces to decide on the formation of a U.S.-south Korea combined division with the U.S. Second Division in south Korea as a mother body and brigade-level units of the puppet army included in it. Staff members of the puppet army will join the command of the U.S. Second Division and a major general of the U.S. forces will hold the post of the commander of the combined division and a brigadier general of the puppet army the post of the vice-commander.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article says the projected organization of the combined division is aimed to ignite another Korean war from A to Z. It goes on:
					
					 The main mission of the U.S. Second Division is to launch attack. Its role has been further enhanced in the U.S. scenario for a war of aggression against the DPRK in recent years.
					
					 It has been reorganized into a "future-oriented division" fully capable of fighting long-distance ground, naval and air battles as it is possessed of services including infantry, mechanized units, artillery pieces, reconnoitering units, air force units and intelligence and telecommunications units and equipped with drones, multi-purpose aircraft, high-speed transport ships, latest tanks and  MLRS. 
					
					 The U.S. has already deployed in the U.S. Second Division MRAPs for paving the way for attack on the north.
					
					 The U.S. is regarding the Korean peninsula as a main target of attack and key zone for its world hegemony.
					
					 It is seriously mistaken if it thinks it can provoke the DPRK while mulling organizing the combined division.

articles.title: S. Korean Chief Executive Accused of Evading Blame for Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korean Chief Executive Accused of Evading Blame for Ferry Sewol Disaster
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea, in an editorial on September 17 accused the puppet chief executive of evading the blame for the ferry Sewol disaster.
					 The editorial recalled that the chief executive held a "state affairs meeting" on Sept. 16 and then was closeted with lawmakers from the "Saenuri Party" at Chongwadae.
					
					 What she uttered reveals her real intention to term the issue of granting the fact-finding committee the right to investigate and indict those responsible for the disaster "unreasonable assertion of bereaved families" and the demand for probing the truth about the disaster "an act of undesirable outside forces with a political purpose", it discharged.
					
					 Her declaration that she cannot accept the issue of the right to investigate and indict is little short of rejecting the institution of a special law, it held.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Denounces Puppet Political Camp's Buck Passing
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Denounces Puppet Political Camp's Buck Passing 
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- The Measure Committee of the Families of Victims, Missing Persons and Survivors of the Ferry Sewol Sinking Accident of south Korea held a press conference outside the building of the "National Assembly" in Seoul on Sept. 15 denouncing the puppet political camp for passing the buck for the situation to the bereaved families, according to the south Korean MBC. 
					 The organization recalled that the bereaved families have been on a sit-in strike outside Chongwadae for dozens of days in demand of the probe into the truth behind the ferry disaster. 
					
					 It accused the political camp of passing the buck for the situation to the bereaved families while interpreting the issue of the ferry Sewol as the issue of confrontation between progressive and conservative forces.
					
					 Bereaved families came out for actions against the chief executive and the NA because no one was punished for spreading misinformation that "all aboard the ferry Sewol was rescued" and no one is ready to own responsibility for the tragedy.
					
					 It urged the political camp to opt for instituting a special law on the ferry Sewol.

articles.title: Brutal Act Reported from S. Korean Puppet Army Unit
articles.content:
Brutal Act Reported from S. Korean Puppet Army Unit
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed that a sergeant belonging to the 1st Paratrooper Brigade of the south Korean puppet army committed such brutal act reminiscent of electric shock torture against his inferiors, sparking off anger, according to the south Korean KBS on Sept. 15.
					 He made no scruple of committing such shuddering act as connecting electric wire of a wireless apparatus to inferiors' lips several times from April 2012 to August of last year, threatening their lives.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Protest against Verdict of Not Guilty Passed to IS Charged with Interference in Election
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Protest against Verdict of Not Guilty Passed to IS Charged with Interference in Election
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- 18 organizations of south Korea including the Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society held a press conference outside the Supreme Prosecutor's Office on Sept. 15 in protest against the verdict of not guilty passed to the puppet Intelligence Service charged with interference in the "presidential" election, according to the south Korean KBS. 
					 On Sept. 11, the Seoul Central District Court held a trial of former Director of the IS Won Se Hun who gave instructions to the IS staff members to  build up public opinion in favor of the "government" policies during the 2012 "presidential" election.
					
					 If the prosecution authorities turn down the appeal against the decision, they will never be able to evade the responsibility for defaming justice, it warned.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Celebrated Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Celebrated Abroad 
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- A reception was given in China, round-table talks, book exhibition and film show took place in Iran and seminar, a photo exhibition and Taekwon-do demonstration in Uganda from Sept. 6 to 12 to celebrate the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK. 
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos documenting the undying exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un, their works and books and photos introducing the true picture of the DPRK winning victory after victory, holding aloft the banner of Songun. 
					
					 Films shown included Korean film "Okryu Children's Hospital". 
					
					 The vice-president of the Chinese People's Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries said he was pleased that the Korean people have achieved big successes in socialist construction under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, General Secretary Kim Jong Il and First Secretary Kim Jong Un for 66 years. 
					
					 Today the Korean people are working hard to build a thriving socialist nation, united close around the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Kim Jong Un, he said, expressing the belief that the flower of Sino-DPRK friendship would bloom thanks to the joint efforts of the parties, governments and peoples of the two countries. 
					
					 The manager of the Iran-Korea Friendship Magsal Agro-Stock Farm said that after its foundation the DPRK turned into a socialist state, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence, and a politico-ideological power which no one dares provoke. 
					
					 The chairman of the Ugandan National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said socialist Korea has become an invulnerable bulwark despite the complicated international situation and imperialists' pressure. The Songun politics in the DPRK is an example to be followed by the African people exposed to the neo-colonial threat of big powers, he added. 
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event in Uganda.

articles.title: DPRK's Founding Anniversary Marked Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Founding Anniversary Marked Abroad 
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Lectures were given at the Pakistan Association for Self-Reliance Studies, Dickson Wong SDN. BHD. in Malaysia, a construction company in Cabinda Province and other company of Angola, Angolan Shipbuilding Yard and a Malian group from Sept. 5 to 8 to mark the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK. 
					 The secretary general of the Pakistan Association for Self-reliance Studies said:
					
					 The DPRK founded by President Kim Il Sung is an invincible socialist power. 
					
					 The DPRK, though not big in its territory, is known as a powerful country to the world. 
					
					 It is the brilliant fruition of the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK. 
					
					 The DPRK is proudly demonstrating its dignity in the international arena, possessed of nuclear deterrence for self-defence. 
					
					 Respected Marshal Kim Jong Un is consolidating socialist Korea as an invulnerable bulwark, firmly adhering to the Songun revolutionary line. 
					
					 He is a brilliant commander and prominent statesman decisive in adopting a decision and strong in guts. 
					
					 The manager of the Dickson Wong SDN. BHD. in Malaysia, the Angolan company manager and the vice-manager of the shipbuilding yard of Angola praised Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for founding the DPRK and turning it into a rich and powerful socialist power. 
					
					 The director of a Malian group said that the DPRK will shine long as an invincible socialist power thanks to the leadership of Kim Jong Un who is carrying forward the great intention of the preceding leaders.

articles.title: Delegacion del PTC visita a Alemania, Belgica, Suiza e Italia
articles.content:
Delegacion del PTC visita a Alemania, Belgica, Suiza e Italia
Pyongyang, 19 de septiembre (ACNC) -- La delegacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, presidida por Kang Sok Ju, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del PTC, visito del dia 7 al 16 a Alemania, Belgica, Suiza e Italia.
					Durante la estancia en los paises europeos, la delegacion se reunio con Niels Annen, miembro del Buro Politico y presidente del Comite Internacional del Partido Social-Democrata de Alemania, el delegado de alto nivel del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Federal de Alemania, el subsecretario general encargado de relaciones exteriores del Partido de Socialistas Europeos, el vicepresidente encargado de relaciones exteriores del Grupo de Partidos Sociales del Parlamento Europeo, el presidente del Comite de Relaciones Exteriores del Parlamento Europeo, el representante especial encargado de DDHH del Servicio de Accion External de Europa, Stavros Lambrinidis, el secretario general del Partido Popular Democratico Cristiano de Suiza, Beatrice Wertli Meierhans, el ex presidente de la Confederacion Suiza, Pascal Couchepin, el secretario de Estado del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Confederacion Suiza, Yves Rossier, y el subsecretario de Estado y di
					
					 rector para Asia-Pacifico, Yohannes Matyassy, del MINREX de la Confederacion Suiza, el vicepresidente del senado de Italia, el secretario general del Comite de Relaciones Exteriores del senado, Antonio Razzi, y otras personalidades del Parlamento de Italia, el oficial ejecutivo en jefe de la Inter-Mediacion y ex jefe de Downing Street del Estado Mayor del Primer Ministro, Jonathan Powell, y otras figuras politicas de diferentes partidos europeos y de los partidos politicos, gobiernos y circulo economico.
					
					En las ocasiones fue debatido el problema sobre el desarrollo de las relaciones entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Union Europea y varios paises europeos.
					
					Se ha informado la situacion politica y economica de la RPDC y Europa, se han intercambiado las opiniones sinceras y profundas sobre los problemas de interes mutuo, se ha manifestado el entendimiento mutuo en muchos temas y se ha llegado al consenso de esforzarse activamente en lo adelante por desarrollar las relaciones bilaterales.
					
					Muchas personalidades, inclusive el presidente del Comite Internacional del Partido Social-Democrata de Alemania y el secretario de Estado del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de Suiza, expresaron la voluntad de visitar a Pyongyang para debatir con mayor profundidad el problema sobre el desarrollo de relaciones bilaterales.

articles.title: Presidente del Niger desea reunificacion de Corea
articles.content:
Presidente del Niger desea reunificacion de Corea
Pyongyang, 19 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El presidente de la Republica del Niger, Mahamadou Issoufou, recibio el dia 12 las cartas credenciales del nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en ese pais, Jong Yong Chol.
					En la ocasion el mandatario dijo que el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il apoyaron y ayudaron en su vida la lucha de Niger y otros paises africanos por la independencia nacional y la construccion de nueva sociedad.
					
					Senalo que los pueblos africanos guardan ese hecho en lo profundo del corazon.
					
					Expreso admiracion por el hecho de que el Mariscal Kim Jong Un hace brillar a la RPDC como pais poderoso continuando la causa de los lideres antecesores.
					
					Deseo que bajo la sabia direccion del Mariscal, marchen bien todas las cosas en la RPDC y se logre cuanto antes de modo pacifico la reunificacion de Corea.

articles.title: Tiene lugar presentacion de exitos cientifico-tecnicos de rama de industria quimica
articles.content:
Tiene lugar presentacion de exitos cientifico-tecnicos de rama de industria quimica
Anju, 19 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar los dias 18 y 19 en el Complejo Quimico Juventud de Namhung la presentacion nacional de exitos cientifico-tecnicos de la rama de industria quimica, auspiciada por el Comite Central de la Federacion General de Ciencia y Tecnica de Corea.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los cientificos, tecnicos, profesores, investigadores, cursantes de instituto doctoral y funcionarios de las ramas de ciencia, educacion e industria quimica, inclusive, la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, la Universidad Kim Il Sung, la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek, la Universidad Pedagogica Kim Hyong Jik, la Universidad de Industria Ligera Han Tok Su y el complejo arriba mencionado.
					
					  Fueron presentados mas de 60 tesis valiosas preparadas por varias unidades.
					
					  Los participantes informaron los exitos y experiencias logrados en resolver los problemas cientifico-tecnicos surgidos en desarrollar mas la industria quimica del pais, de modo que se haga posible producir los abonos y articulos quimicos usando las materias primas y materiales domesticos.

articles.title: Equipo de futbol de RPDC avanza a la fase de knock-out
articles.content:
Equipo de futbol de RPDC avanza a la fase de knock-out
Inchon, 18 de septiembre (Corresponsal de ACNC) -- El dia 18, se entablo el partido entre las selecciones de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Pakistan que pertenecen al grupo F del futbol masculino de  los XVII Juegos Asiaticos.
					A los minutos 40, el numero 20 So Kyong Jin marco el primer gol aprovechando el penalti de 11 metros.
					
					A los minutos 68, el numero 11 Jong Il Gwan logro el segundo gol cabeceando el balon que le paso el numero 13 Sim Hyon Jin.
					
					El partido termino con el marcador de 2:0 a favor del once coreano.
					
					Asi el equipo coreano avanzo a la fase de knock-out al ocupar el primer lugar en su llave F.

articles.title: Tendra lugar competencia masiva interprovincial nacional-14
articles.content:
Tendra lugar competencia masiva interprovincial nacional-14
Pyongyang, 19 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Tendra lugar en esta capital la competencia masiva interprovincial nacional-14.
					Se realizaran desde el dia primero al 10 de octubre en el Estadio Kim Il Sung, el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang, el Centro de Tiro Meari y otros lugares de la capital las competencias de futbol (f), voleibol (m), baloncesto (f), patinaje de ruedas, tiro y otros juegos deportivos masivos y recreativos. 
					
					En la presente cita deportiva tomaran parte los obreros, campesinos, oficinistas, jovenes, alumnos, ninos de jardines de infancia, amas de casa y otros habitantes de distintos estratos, seleccionados en la capital y las provincias (o ciudades subordinadas directamente al centro), y los deportistas.
